meta.title: Get all Currencies - Currencies - Endpoints - Currencies - Catalog - API Docs
meta.description:
Returns a list of all store Currency.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see...

blocks.data: Returns a list of all store *Currency*.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Information & Settings | modify | `store_v2_information` |
|  Information & Settings | read-only | `store_v2_information_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Client`|`client_id`|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Client: {client_id}
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |

* **Location**: header

is_default.description: Specifies whether this is the store’s default currency display format and may only be adjusted in the control panel. READ-ONLY

last_updated.description: Date the currency was last updated, created or modified.

country_iso2.description: 2-letter ISO Alpha-2 code for this currency’s country.

currency_exchange_rate.description: Amount of this currency that is equivalent to one U.S. dollar.(Float, Float as String, Integer)

auto_update.description: Specifies whether to use the Open Exchange Rates service to update the currency conversion. A value of false specifies a static conversion value.

token_location.description: Specifies whether this currency’s symbol appears to the “left” or “right” of the numeric amount.

decimal_token.description: Symbol used as the decimal separator in this currency.

thousands_token.description: Symbol used as the thousands separator in this currency.

decimal_places.description: Number of decimal places to show for this currency.

enabled.description: If the currency is active on the store.

is_transactional.description: Indicates if the currency is set as transactional or not. False means display only currency
